Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Set up Turborepo monorepo structure with TM Forum API scaffolding

This commit establishes the foundational monorepo architecture for the
TM Forum APIs project:

- Configure Turborepo with Bun workspaces for monorepo management
- Add turbo.json with build, dev, test, and lint pipelines
- Create service placeholders for all four TM Forum APIs:
  - TMF620 Product Catalog \(port 3620\)
  - TMF629 Customer Management \(port 3629\)
  - TMF632 Party Management \(port 3632\)
  - TMF673 Geographic Address \(port 3673\)
- Create shared packages:
  - @tm-forum/shared with core TypeScript types \(TMForumEntity,
    RelatedParty, TimePeriod, Characteristic, ContactMedium,
    TMForumError, TMForumEvent, pagination types\)
  - @tm-forum/tmf-common placeholder for Hono middleware
  - @tm-forum/database placeholder for Drizzle utilities
- Add Docker configuration:
  - docker-compose.yml with PostgreSQL 16 and Redis 7
  - init-databases.sql to create the four service databases
  - Health checks for both services
- Update README with project overview and getting started guide
- Update TODO.md to track completed Phase 1 tasks
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement @tm-forum/database package with Drizzle ORM utilities

Add database connectivity and testing utilities for TM Forum API services:

- Install drizzle-orm and postgres driver dependencies
- Add drizzle-kit for database migrations
- Create connection.ts with:
  - createConnection\(\) factory for Drizzle database instances
  - createConnectionString\(\) helper for building PostgreSQL URLs
  - Configurable connection pooling \(max connections, idle timeout\)
- Create columns.ts with reusable Drizzle column definitions:
  - tmForumColumns: id, href, @type, @baseType, @schemaLocation, timestamps
  - validForColumns: validFor start/end timestamps
  - statusColumns: status and statusReason fields
  - lifecycleColumns: lifecycleStatus and lastUpdate
- Create test-utils.ts with ephemeral database helpers:
  - createTestDatabase\(\): creates unique test DB with cleanup function
  - destroyTestDatabase\(\): terminates connections and drops test DB
  - Environment variable support for connection configuration
- Export all utilities from package index
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement @tm-forum/tmf-common package with Hono middleware and utilities

Add comprehensive middleware, utilities, and event system for TM Forum APIs:

Middleware:
- fields-filter: Parses ?fields= query parameter and filters JSON responses
  to return only requested fields \(supports nested objects and arrays\)
- error-handler: Converts exceptions to TM Forum error format with proper
  HTTP status codes. Includes error classes: TMForumApiError, NotFoundError,
  BadRequestError, ValidationError, ConflictError, InternalServerError
- request-id: Adds X-Request-Id header for request tracking \(generates UUID
  or uses existing header value\)
- pagination: Parses offset/limit query params with configurable defaults
  \(default 20, max 100\), provides setPaginationHeaders helper

Utilities:
- href: createHref and createHrefFactory for generating TM Forum entity hrefs
- response: sendList, sendCreated, sendNoContent, sendOk response helpers

Events:
- publisher: EventPublisher class for Redis pub/sub with TMF688-style events
- hub-manager: HubManager for managing webhook subscriptions with callback
  delivery \(includes InMemoryHubStorage for development\)
- types: TypeScript interfaces for events and hub subscriptions
EOF
\)")
